content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252712,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんで人間側についたのかは理解出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't understand why they sided with the humans."},{"lineNumber":252713,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく潰してしまえ、数では我々の方が上だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, crush them—we have the advantage in numbers."},{"lineNumber":252714,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、となりに布陣していたハニーキングの軍がいきなり攻撃してきて","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, the army of the Honey King stationed next door suddenly attacked us,"},{"lineNumber":252715,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなり混乱しましたが、なんとか立て直せそうです。と部下の報告","translatedEnglishLine":"It caused quite a confusion, but it seems we can somehow recover. That's the report from the subordinate."},{"lineNumber":252716,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに報告、人間どもの部隊が現れました。ハニーと共闘して我々を攻めてきました","translatedEnglishLine":"Report: Human forces have appeared. They attacked us in cooperation with the Honey."},{"lineNumber":252717,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむむ、おのれ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... damn them..."},{"lineNumber":252718,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは撤退するか・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Should we retreat here...?"},{"lineNumber":252719,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍閣下、この者達はどうしますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Great General, what shall we do about these people?"},{"lineNumber":252720,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには、ここにウルザ達、優秀な人間が２０人ほど牢に入れられていた","translatedEnglishLine":"There, Urza and about twenty other capable humans were imprisoned."},{"lineNumber":252721,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭のいい人間はほとんど殺しますが、魔物将軍の中に入れる頭脳、優秀な人間も一定数が","translatedEnglishLine":"We kill most intelligent humans, but a certain number of brilliant and capable humans are needed among the demon generals."},{"lineNumber":252722,"originalJapaneseLine":"必要なので２０名ほどだけ集めて大切に養殖しようという事で集めた者達ですが","translatedEnglishLine":"So they gathered about twenty to carefully cultivate and raise them."},{"lineNumber":252723,"originalJapaneseLine":"連れていけ、さすがに捨てるのはもったいない","translatedEnglishLine":"Take them with you. It would be a waste to just abandon them."},{"lineNumber":252724,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザ・・　ランス君、この場所伝えたの、受け取ってくれたよね","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza... Lance-kun, I told you this location, and you received it, right?"},{"lineNumber":252725,"originalJapaneseLine":"よっしゃ、発見。とランスが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, found you. Lance appeared."},{"lineNumber":252726,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンとランスの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Tsoton and Lance."},{"lineNumber":252727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは、側の牢にウルザを確認する。無事だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance checks the nearby prison for Urza. She is safe."},{"lineNumber":252728,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーーし、ぶっ殺す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I'll kill them all."},{"lineNumber":252729,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":252730,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘の途中、割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Mid-battle, an interrupt event."},{"lineNumber":252731,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキングが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honey King appears."},{"lineNumber":252732,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間よ助っ人するぞ、この魔物大将軍は外道！倒すべき相手だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans, I'm here to help! This demon general is a scoundrel! He must be defeated!"},{"lineNumber":252733,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、ハニワの助っ人などいらん、あっちいけ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, we don't need help from the Honey! Go away."},{"lineNumber":252734,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝手に加わってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"He joined the fight without permission."},{"lineNumber":252735,"originalJapaneseLine":"ツォトンが倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton fell."},{"lineNumber":252736,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはカオスを念入り突き刺す止めを刺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance carefully stabs Chaos to finish it off."},{"lineNumber":252737,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトンはランスとハニーキングに殺されたと誰かが叫ぶ広める","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone shouts and spreads that the demon general Tsoton was killed by Lance and the Honey King."},{"lineNumber":252738,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍はあわてて総崩れになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army panicked and completely collapsed."},{"lineNumber":252739,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー達が、あいやー、あいやー、と勝ちどきをあげている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honey and others are cheering victoriously, \"Aiya! Aiya!\""},{ "lineNumber":252740, "originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252741,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとウルザ、再開。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and Urza reunite."},{"lineNumber":252742,"originalJapaneseLine":"よかったとウルザを抱きしめる、無茶するな、心配したぞとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He hugged Urza, saying 'I'm glad... don't be reckless, I was worried' and such."},{"lineNumber":252743,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス君、心配しすぎだよ・・とかウルザはおねーさんぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza, like an older sister, said 'Lance-kun, you worry too much...'"},{"lineNumber":252744,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、これでゼス方面はなんとか落ち着くね","translatedEnglishLine":"But with this, the Zeth area will somehow settle down."},{"lineNumber":252745,"originalJapaneseLine":"と誰か〆の話を・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone made a closing remark..."},{"lineNumber":252746,"originalJapaneseLine":"３日後、ゼスの各地でゼスとハニーの連合軍により猛反撃が行われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Three days later, fierce counterattacks were launched by the allied forces of Zeth and the Honey across Zeth."},{"lineNumber":252747,"originalJapaneseLine":"各将軍のかっこいいシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Cool scenes of each general."},{"lineNumber":252748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（この辺りは、ゼス自力解放　の方から一部抜き出して使用が良いと思う）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Around here, I think it's good to extract and use parts from 'Zeth Self-Liberation'.)"},{"lineNumber":252749,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（かなり　長くなってもいいです　イベントは分割も可）","translatedEnglishLine":"(It's okay if it's quite long. Events can also be divided.)"},{"lineNumber":252750,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnarok Arc"},{"lineNumber":252751,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックが千鶴子より前線から報告を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic receives a frontline report from Chizuruko."},{"lineNumber":252752,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス国内の魔軍も大半は撃破に成功しました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Most of the demon army within Zeth has been successfully defeated."},{"lineNumber":252753,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジノライン主要部分の奪還を完了、マナバッテリーを再起動させ要塞を稼働させました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Recapture of the main part of the Maginot Line has been completed; the mana battery was restarted, and the fortress was activated."},{"lineNumber":252754,"originalJapaneseLine":"これにより、国内で組織だった行動をする魔軍はいなくなりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this, there are no demon armies conducting organized actions inside the country anymore."},{"lineNumber":252755,"originalJapaneseLine":"よかったと・・マジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic said, 'That's good...'"},{"lineNumber":252756,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ここはＩＦでガンジーも出したいかな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Here, I wonder if Gandhi should appear as an IF option.)"},{"lineNumber":252757,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザもいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza is also here."},{"lineNumber":252758,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキングが率いるハニー達、１０万が大きかったわね。","translatedEnglishLine":"The hundred thousand Honey led by the Honey King was significant."},{"lineNumber":252759,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らが最後まで一緒に戦ってくれるとは思わなかったわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't expect them to fight alongside us until the very end."},{"lineNumber":252760,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの惨殺記録を見せる事でハニー達を魔軍と仲違いさせる所までは","translatedEnglishLine":"Showing the massacre records committed by Medusa managed to make the Honey distrust the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":252761,"originalJapaneseLine":"計算通りだったのだけど、どうして、ここまで手伝ってくれたのかしら","translatedEnglishLine":"That was all according to plan, but I wonder why they helped this much."},{"lineNumber":252762,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かがいう、なんでもハニーキングとランスさんの間で密約が交わされたとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone said that a secret pact was made between the Honey King and Lance."},{"lineNumber":252763,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの二人、以外と話があったようですよ","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems those two actually talked quite a bit."},{"lineNumber":252764,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふーん、どうせ、なんかエロい話に違いないわ、ぷんぷんとマジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, no doubt it's some kind of dirty talk, Magic grumbled."},{"lineNumber":252765,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnarok Arc"},{"lineNumber":252766,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがウルザにお願いしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance is asking Urza for a favor."},{"lineNumber":252767,"originalJapaneseLine":"困りますとウルザ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza says, 'That would be troubling...'"},{"lineNumber":252768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252769,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとハニーキングの語らい","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Lance and the Honey King."},{"lineNumber":252770,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうかあの子はウルザちゃんというのか、あやうく魔軍に騙される所だったが","translatedEnglishLine":"So that girl is called Urza-chan. I almost got deceived by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":252771,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女のおかげて助かったよ、だが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to her, I was saved. However..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで人間側についたのかは理解出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand why they sided with the humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく潰してしまえ、数では我々の方が上だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, crush them—we have the advantage in numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、となりに布陣していたハニーキングの軍がいきなり攻撃してきて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the army of the Honey King stationed next door suddenly attacked us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり混乱しましたが、なんとか立て直せそうです。と部下の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It caused quite a confusion, but it seems we can somehow recover. That's the report from the subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、人間どもの部隊が現れました。ハニーと共闘して我々を攻めてきました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: Human forces have appeared. They attacked us in cooperation with the Honey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、おのれ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... damn them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは撤退するか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we retreat here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍閣下、この者達はどうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General, what shall we do about these people?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには、ここにウルザ達、優秀な人間が２０人ほど牢に入れられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There, Urza and about twenty other capable humans were imprisoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のいい人間はほとんど殺しますが、魔物将軍の中に入れる頭脳、優秀な人間も一定数が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We kill most intelligent humans, but a certain number of brilliant and capable humans are needed among the demon generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なので２０名ほどだけ集めて大切に養殖しようという事で集めた者達ですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they gathered about twenty to carefully cultivate and raise them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていけ、さすがに捨てるのはもったいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take them with you. It would be a waste to just abandon them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ・・　ランス君、この場所伝えたの、受け取ってくれたよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza... Lance-kun, I told you this location, and you received it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よっしゃ、発見。とランスが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, found you. Lance appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Tsoton and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、側の牢にウルザを確認する。無事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance checks the nearby prison for Urza. She is safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーーし、ぶっ殺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll kill them all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の途中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mid-battle, an interrupt event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey King appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間よ助っ人するぞ、この魔物大将軍は外道！倒すべき相手だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans, I'm here to help! This demon general is a scoundrel! He must be defeated!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、ハニワの助っ人などいらん、あっちいけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, we don't need help from the Honey! Go away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に加わってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He joined the fight without permission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンが倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはカオスを念入り突き刺す止めを刺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance carefully stabs Chaos to finish it off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンはランスとハニーキングに殺されたと誰かが叫ぶ広める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone shouts and spreads that the demon general Tsoton was killed by Lance and the Honey King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はあわてて総崩れになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army panicked and completely collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達が、あいやー、あいやー、と勝ちどきをあげている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey and others are cheering victoriously, "Aiya! Aiya!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとウルザ、再開。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Urza reunite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったとウルザを抱きしめる、無茶するな、心配したぞとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hugged Urza, saying 'I'm glad... don't be reckless, I was worried' and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君、心配しすぎだよ・・とかウルザはおねーさんぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza, like an older sister, said 'Lance-kun, you worry too much...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、これでゼス方面はなんとか落ち着くね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But with this, the Zeth area will somehow settle down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と誰か〆の話を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone made a closing remark...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後、ゼスの各地でゼスとハニーの連合軍により猛反撃が行われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three days later, fierce counterattacks were launched by the allied forces of Zeth and the Honey across Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各将軍のかっこいいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cool scenes of each general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この辺りは、ゼス自力解放　の方から一部抜き出して使用が良いと思う）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Around here, I think it's good to extract and use parts from 'Zeth Self-Liberation'.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （かなり　長くなってもいいです　イベントは分割も可）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It's okay if it's quite long. Events can also be divided.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックが千鶴子より前線から報告を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic receives a frontline report from Chizuruko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国内の魔軍も大半は撃破に成功しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most of the demon army within Zeth has been successfully defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン主要部分の奪還を完了、マナバッテリーを再起動させ要塞を稼働させました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recapture of the main part of the Maginot Line has been completed; the mana battery was restarted, and the fortress was activated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、国内で組織だった行動をする魔軍はいなくなりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, there are no demon armies conducting organized actions inside the country anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったと・・マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic said, 'That's good...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここはＩＦでガンジーも出したいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Here, I wonder if Gandhi should appear as an IF option.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザもいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza is also here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが率いるハニー達、１０万が大きかったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hundred thousand Honey led by the Honey King was significant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らが最後まで一緒に戦ってくれるとは思わなかったわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't expect them to fight alongside us until the very end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの惨殺記録を見せる事でハニー達を魔軍と仲違いさせる所までは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing the massacre records committed by Medusa managed to make the Honey distrust the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計算通りだったのだけど、どうして、ここまで手伝ってくれたのかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was all according to plan, but I wonder why they helped this much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがいう、なんでもハニーキングとランスさんの間で密約が交わされたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said that a secret pact was made between the Honey King and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの二人、以外と話があったようですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems those two actually talked quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、どうせ、なんかエロい話に違いないわ、ぷんぷんとマジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, no doubt it's some kind of dirty talk, Magic grumbled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがウルザにお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is asking Urza for a favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困りますとウルザ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza says, 'That would be troubling...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとハニーキングの語らい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Lance and the Honey King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうかあの子はウルザちゃんというのか、あやうく魔軍に騙される所だったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that girl is called Urza-chan. I almost got deceived by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女のおかげて助かったよ、だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to her, I was saved. However...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I almost got deceived by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":252771,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女のおかげて助かったよ、だが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to her, I was saved. However..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで人間側についたのかは理解出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand why they sided with the humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく潰してしまえ、数では我々の方が上だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, crush them—we have the advantage in numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、となりに布陣していたハニーキングの軍がいきなり攻撃してきて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, the army of the Honey King stationed next door suddenly attacked us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり混乱しましたが、なんとか立て直せそうです。と部下の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It caused quite a confusion, but it seems we can somehow recover. That's the report from the subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、人間どもの部隊が現れました。ハニーと共闘して我々を攻めてきました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: Human forces have appeared. They attacked us in cooperation with the Honey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、おのれ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... damn them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは撤退するか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we retreat here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍閣下、この者達はどうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Great General, what shall we do about these people?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには、ここにウルザ達、優秀な人間が２０人ほど牢に入れられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There, Urza and about twenty other capable humans were imprisoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のいい人間はほとんど殺しますが、魔物将軍の中に入れる頭脳、優秀な人間も一定数が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We kill most intelligent humans, but a certain number of brilliant and capable humans are needed among the demon generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なので２０名ほどだけ集めて大切に養殖しようという事で集めた者達ですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they gathered about twenty to carefully cultivate and raise them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていけ、さすがに捨てるのはもったいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take them with you. It would be a waste to just abandon them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ・・　ランス君、この場所伝えたの、受け取ってくれたよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza... Lance-kun, I told you this location, and you received it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よっしゃ、発見。とランスが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, found you. Lance appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Tsoton and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、側の牢にウルザを確認する。無事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance checks the nearby prison for Urza. She is safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーーし、ぶっ殺す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll kill them all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の途中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mid-battle, an interrupt event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey King appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間よ助っ人するぞ、この魔物大将軍は外道！倒すべき相手だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans, I'm here to help! This demon general is a scoundrel! He must be defeated!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、ハニワの助っ人などいらん、あっちいけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, we don't need help from the Honey! Go away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に加わってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He joined the fight without permission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンが倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはカオスを念入り突き刺す止めを刺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance carefully stabs Chaos to finish it off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンはランスとハニーキングに殺されたと誰かが叫ぶ広める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone shouts and spreads that the demon general Tsoton was killed by Lance and the Honey King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はあわてて総崩れになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army panicked and completely collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー達が、あいやー、あいやー、と勝ちどきをあげている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honey and others are cheering victoriously, "Aiya! Aiya!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとウルザ、再開。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Urza reunite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったとウルザを抱きしめる、無茶するな、心配したぞとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hugged Urza, saying 'I'm glad... don't be reckless, I was worried' and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君、心配しすぎだよ・・とかウルザはおねーさんぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza, like an older sister, said 'Lance-kun, you worry too much...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、これでゼス方面はなんとか落ち着くね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But with this, the Zeth area will somehow settle down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と誰か〆の話を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone made a closing remark...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後、ゼスの各地でゼスとハニーの連合軍により猛反撃が行われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three days later, fierce counterattacks were launched by the allied forces of Zeth and the Honey across Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各将軍のかっこいいシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cool scenes of each general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （この辺りは、ゼス自力解放　の方から一部抜き出して使用が良いと思う）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Around here, I think it's good to extract and use parts from 'Zeth Self-Liberation'.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （かなり　長くなってもいいです　イベントは分割も可）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It's okay if it's quite long. Events can also be divided.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックが千鶴子より前線から報告を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic receives a frontline report from Chizuruko.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス国内の魔軍も大半は撃破に成功しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most of the demon army within Zeth has been successfully defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン主要部分の奪還を完了、マナバッテリーを再起動させ要塞を稼働させました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Recapture of the main part of the Maginot Line has been completed; the mana battery was restarted, and the fortress was activated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、国内で組織だった行動をする魔軍はいなくなりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, there are no demon armies conducting organized actions inside the country anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったと・・マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic said, 'That's good...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここはＩＦでガンジーも出したいかな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Here, I wonder if Gandhi should appear as an IF option.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザもいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza is also here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングが率いるハニー達、１０万が大きかったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hundred thousand Honey led by the Honey King was significant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らが最後まで一緒に戦ってくれるとは思わなかったわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't expect them to fight alongside us until the very end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの惨殺記録を見せる事でハニー達を魔軍と仲違いさせる所までは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing the massacre records committed by Medusa managed to make the Honey distrust the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計算通りだったのだけど、どうして、ここまで手伝ってくれたのかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was all according to plan, but I wonder why they helped this much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがいう、なんでもハニーキングとランスさんの間で密約が交わされたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said that a secret pact was made between the Honey King and Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの二人、以外と話があったようですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems those two actually talked quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、どうせ、なんかエロい話に違いないわ、ぷんぷんとマジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, no doubt it's some kind of dirty talk, Magic grumbled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarok Arc

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがウルザにお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is asking Urza for a favor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困りますとウルザ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza says, 'That would be troubling...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとハニーキングの語らい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Lance and the Honey King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうかあの子はウルザちゃんというのか、あやうく魔軍に騙される所だったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that girl is called Urza-chan. I almost got deceived by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女のおかげて助かったよ、だが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to her, I was saved. However...
